title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

1. Load the data

```{r}
train <- read.csv("train.csv")
test <- read.csv("test.csv")

str(train)

```


2. Checking NA values
```{r}
sapply(train, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

sapply(train, function(x) length(unique(x)))

```

3. Removing column MGR_ID and ROLE_TITLE

```{r}

train <- train[,-3]
str(train)

train <- train[,-6]
str(train)
```

4. Fitting the model


```{r}

train_new <- train[1:27768,]
test_new <- train[27769:32769,]
test_new$action <-NULL 

model <- glm(ACTION ~., family = binomial(link = 'logit'), data = train_new)
summary(model)



```


5. Predicting test data
```{r}
result <- predict(model, test_new, type = "response")
summary(result)
result <- ifelse(result > 0.87,1,0)
head(result)
```


Accuracy
```{r}

misclassifier <- mean(result != train[27769:32769,1])

accuracy = 1-misclassifier
accuracy

```
